description.para: This skill covers all forms of athletics, gymnastics and acrobatics, including running, jumping and climbing. It is a very broad skill, but it is very rare for a character to be interested in one facet of it, and not the others.
Athletic skill checks are normally either instant (jump onto a table) or extended (climbing a tree or running some distance).

Sprinting. A character has a base movement (their combat move) of agility + strength + 4 metres per round. The character can run at double this, or sprint at triple this speed. When sprinting the character adds the square root of
agility athletics
to their movement.

Climbing. A climbing character should use the base difficulties given below using
agility athletics
A failed roll means that the character is stuck for that round, unless the roll was failed by ten or more, in which case the character will slip and fall. For each 10 by which the target is exceeded, the distance covered is increased by a multiple (x2, x3 etc), up to a maximum of twice the character's combat move (CM).

This skill is used by the character when there is a chance of noticing something which isn't obvious, such as someone trying to sneak around, people moving at a distance, or looking for a secret door. If the character is asleep, then any awareness rolls are quartered. If the character is only dozing (or day dreaming), then rolls are halved.

examples.example: Hear people talking through a door
Hear people talking through a wall

skill.name: Brawl
skill.description: A general purpose combat skill covering dodging, punching and wrestling. This is covered in more detail in the combat section.

description.para: The skill of being sociable, in a generally honest and open fashion. Charm is charisma based when trying to make a good impression, to cheer someone up or to befriend them. It can be used to try to get someone to open up about a subject they would not normally want to talk about.
If trying to change someone's mind by emotional arguments, charisma x charm is used against will x ego.

examples.example: Flirt successfully with someone (add appearance to ability roll)
Warm the heart of a guard

description.para: The ability to use deceit and deception in social situations, and also to be able to counter the same. With this skill, you can lie convincingly with both words and body language, see through other people's lies and have a good idea as to their emotions.
It is used with charisma to fool others, possibly intelligence to think of a good excuse when fast talking, and perception when detecting subterfuge in others.

skill.name: Sleight
skill.description: Sleight of hand, from filching items on a market stall, to picking someone's pockets. Can also be used for anything which requires a great deal of fine dexterity.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: Moving quietly, hiding, and generally not being seen or heard. Based on agility for moving quietly, or perception for finding somewhere to hide.

description.para: This is the ranged attack equivalent of the brawl skill, and is used for throwing rocks, spears, knives, axes etc at distance targets. The talent is perception based. For hurled improvised weapons, short range is considered to be four times strength, medium twice this, and long range twice medium.
This skill can also be used to catch items. When trying to catch an item, throw is dexterity based.
